title: The Martian - 2015 3D+2D MVC H264 1080p BDRip Eng
description:
This 3D MKV file supports Multiview Video Coding (MVC), an amendment to standard H264 video compression. MVC is used for Bluray 3D and is also completely backward compatible for normal 2D viewing. Older devices and software that doesn't support the extra MVC 3D stream will ignore this additional information and play the file as normal 2D.

Newer 3D supported players such as Stereoscopic player (www.3dtv.at/) allow for the full MVC 3D experience by delivering full HD 1920x1080p to each eye. The full Bluray 3D experience has faithfully been captured and stored by this much smaller and more manageable 3D MKV rip. Enjoy!

If your player does not natively support MVC 3D then add support with MadVR (http://www.videohelp.com/software/madVR) and LAV Filters (http://www.videohelp.com/software/LAV-Filters) by setting these to be the preferred codecs and filters within your player. This can be done in most good free players. (PotPlayer, VLC, MPC-HC, etc)


MKV File Information:

Picture:  H264 AVC+MVC 1920x1080p VBR 8000 Mbps
Audio: English AC3 5.1 at 448 Mbps
Subtitles: English, Russian.
Chapters: Included
